full.extract:
Dr. Tobias Abse is a Marxist historian and a professor at Goldsmiths College of the University of London. Abse has written extensively for the rise of the Fascist Right in Italy prior to World War II. He has been a member of the Socialist Alliance National Executive, the Alliance for Green Socialism National Committee, the Socialist History Society committee and the Revolutionary History editorial board and is a regular contributor to socialist newspapers and magazines. Tobias also is credited for his lecture and orator skills. His method of "talking to the wall" has been replicated by many lecturers across the University of London area with great results.
Abse is the son of the late former Labour MP and social reformer Leo Abse.
full.title: Tobias Abse
